fields.heading: Hone your Jedi Skills
fields.caption: All members have access to our unique training and achievements latters. Progress through the levels and show everyone who the top Jedi Master is!

fields.heading: Build your Clan
fields.caption: Engage in meaningful conversation, or bloodthirsty battle! If it's related to Star Wars, in any way, you better believe we do it.

fields.heading: Find Love
fields.caption: Everybody knows Star Wars fans are the best mates for Star Wars fans. Find your Princess Leia or Han Solo and explore the stars together.
